p: Quercetin has been shown to be important in the fight against parasites and has been demonstrated in different clinical trials, such as those against Leishmania, Trypanosoma, and Plasmodium. The antiparasitic effect is related to the destruction of mitochondrial function and the inhibition of different important enzymes and molecules, including heat-shock protein (HSP), acetylcholinesterase, DNA topoisomerase, and kinase ( Table 7).
